# Datasets {#datasets}

Description of datasets used in the code companion

```{r}
download_file(
  path = c("data/accelerated.csv",
           "data/adversity.csv",
           "data/executive-function.csv",
           "data/external-math.csv",
           "data/feedback-learning.csv",
           "data/multiple-cohort-long.csv",
           "data/multiple-cohort.csv",
           "data/single-cohort.csv",
           "data/trials.csv"),
  output_name = "codebook-datasets",
  button_label = "Download Codebook Datasets",
  button_type = "default",
  has_icon = TRUE,
  icon = "fa fa-save",
  self_contained = FALSE
)
```
